body: 1x might be your first choice if you're a mountain biker, gravel rider, or commuting on flat roads. It's also ideal if your priority is maximum reliability and simple maintenance. 2x might suit you more if you're a road cyclist, gravel rider covering various road surfaces, a tourist, or if you ride in hilly regions. It offers smoother gear transition
